{exp:cartthrob:set_config} {if group_id == 7} {set_price_field channel="products" field="product_discounted_price"} {if:else} {set_price_field channel="products" field="product_price"} {/if} {/exp:cartthrob:set_config}
Allows you to override some cart settings on the fly
NOTE: example requires that you have a group_id:7, a "products" channel, "product_price and "product_discounted_price" fields
http://cartthrob.com/docs/tags_detail/set_config/
